attributes.action: I ask that the UK FCO and Parliament change the travel advise of Tunisia
attributes.additional_details: My mother is 66 years old and has insurance but can not have cover in Tunisia at the moment due to the FCO advise voids this. There for I have not seen my family for 8months as I live and work in Tunisia this causes great strain and upset as is breaking families.  As a UK citizen I believe our rights are been taken from us to choose. Many countries world wide are able to travel and holiday in Tunisia and I demand the right of choose for the UK people to be able to make there own decisions to travel or not.
attributes.background: The Fco and Parliment state all but essential travel to Tunisia. I believe it is essential to see husbands,wife's,partners,friends. The decision taken by the UK has meant no medical insurance cover and is affecting family relatives and relations from there rights.
